DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine whether behavioral activation adjuvant standard smoke cessation treatment improve smoke cessation outcome among veteran PTSD relative comparably intense combination standard smoke cessation treatment + health smoking education . It expect behavioral activation produce successful result health smoke education pair standard smoke cessation treatment . After initial phone screen , in-person screening , baseline assessment , enrol participant randomize either behavioral activation therapy standard smoke cessation treatment ( BA+ST ) health smoke education standard smoke cessation treatment ( HSE+ST ) . Both group meet therapist week 8 week receive either BA+ST HSE+ST . Participants ' mood smoking outcomes monitor throughout 8 week treatment 2 follow-up visit 2 follow-up phone call .
